text.title: North Korea puts military in 'quasi-state of war'
text.head: North Korea puts military in 'quasi-state of war'
Sources

list.item: "N. Korean leader orders military to have full combat readiness" — Yonhap , August 21, 2015
"Kim Jong Un Guides Emergency Enlarged Meeting of WPK Central Military Commission" — Korean Central News Agency , August 21, 2015
"KPA Supreme Command Warns S. Korean Military to Act with Discretion" — Korean Central News Agency , August 20, 2015
"South Korea fires at North Korea in retaliation for loudspeaker attack" — The Guardian , August 20, 2015
